word_mean: 赛璐珞，假象牙：一种主要由火棉和樟脑组成的物质

sentence.Network_en: King's works seem to lack something on celluloid.
sentence.Network_cn: 金的作品搬上银幕后似乎缺点什么。

sentence.Network_en: Her marvellous acting talent is preserved on celluloid.
sentence.Network_cn: 她非凡的表演才能在电影里被保存下来.

sentence.Network_en: Chopsticks made of celluloid buckle easily in hot water.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛璐璐筷子在热水中容易弯曲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...框的优点发挥到极致、有些日系设计师甚至加入备长炭在赛璐珞(Celluloid)里,增添制作的困难度.可惜的是,因为赛璐珞在使用上比较困.
赛璐璐(Celluloid)是类似塑料的一种材质，却是比塑料更早发明的化学材料，由硝棉与樟脑混合加热加压制成。由于赛璐璐有着硬度强 …

...赛璐珞天花（celluloid ceiling）是玻璃天花板的变种，指荷里活的创意职位里，女人在统计上代表不足。圣地牙哥州立大学的Martha M. Lauzen博士分析了2,718位有份参与各大电影的剪辑|剪辑者、电影监制|监制、执行制作人、电影导演|导演和电影摄影|摄影师。2006年赛璐.

entry.def: You can use celluloid to refer to films and the cinema.

example.ex: King's works seem to lack something on celluloid.
example.tran: 金的作品搬上银幕后似乎缺点什么。

means.word_mean: 1. highly flammable substance made from cellulose nitrate and camphor; used in e.g. motion-picture and X-ray film; its use has decreased with the development of nonflammable thermoplastics
2. a medium that disseminates moving pictures;
1. artificial as if portrayed in a film;
